## Names.getName() method

Convert a Blockly entity name to a legal exportable entity name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getName(nameOrId: string, type: NameType | string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

nameOrId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The Blockly entity name (no constraints) or variable ID.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

type


</td><td>

NameType \| string


</td><td>

The type of the name in Blockly ('VARIABLE', 'PROCEDURE', 'DEVELOPER\_VARIABLE', etc...).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

An entity name that is legal in the exported language.
